EmailTemplate.name: CSO - Requesting Manager Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for Manager Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear AeroCRM Group:
Please update the manager for my SFDC user profile.
User Name: User EID: New Manager Name: New Manager EID:
Thank you!
SEND EMAIL TO:
RSSFDCSecurityTeam@Honeywell.com
Or select the following Salesforce USER:
{!Case.SFDC_Admin__c}
